    • Constructor Detail

      • ConcreteRayIntersection

        public ConcreteRayIntersection(hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Point3D point,
                               double distance,
                               boolean outer,
                               hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Point3D normal,
                               double kdr,
                               double kdg,
                               double kdb,
                               double krr,
                               double krg,
                               double krb,
                               double krn)
        Creates the RayIntersection with given information. Any given coefficient must be in the interval [0.0, 1.0] and no points can be null.
        Parameters:
        point - point of the intersection
        distance - distance from the point to thestart of the ray
        outer - is the intersection outer or inner
        normal - normal vector to the point
        kdr - diffuse coefficient for red
        kdg - diffuse coefficient for green
        kdb - diffuse coefficient for blue
        krr - reflective coefficient for red
        krg - reflective coefficient for green
        krb - reflective coefficient for blue
        krn - reflective power for the color of the object
